Package de.gnwi.jdpdsp.accumulators

Class ParticleForceMagnitudeAccumulator

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.jdpdsp.accumulators.ParticleForceMagnitudeAccumulator
public class ParticleForceMagnitudeAccumulator extends Object
Accumulator for particle force magnitude analysis. The particle related arrays ParticleArrays.getF_x ParticleArrays.getF_y ParticleArrays.getF_z are used for accumulative ("+=" and "-=") operations but their initial value is saved and finally restored, i.e. they are NOT changed by method analyzeParticleForceMagnitudes().

  • Method Details

    • analyzeParticleForceMagnitudes

      public boolean analyzeParticleForceMagnitudes(LinkedList<HarmonicBondChunkArrays> aBondChunkArraysList, float[] aR_x, float[] aR_y, float[] aR_z, Parameters aParameters)
      Analyses particle force magnitudes NOTE: The particle related arrays ParticleArrays.getF_x ParticleArrays.getF_y ParticleArrays.getF_z are used for accumulative ("+=" and "-=") operations but their initial value is saved and finally restored, i.e. they are NOT changed. (No checks are performed)
      Parameters:
      aBondChunkArraysList - List of bond chunk arrays (may be null)
      aR_x - Current x-components of particle positions in simulation box
      aR_y - Current y-components of particle positions in simulation box
      aR_z - Current z-components of particle positions in simulation box
      aParameters - Parameters
      Returns:
      True: Operation successful, false: Otherwise
